title: What was the number one song in 1993? - Quora

response.answer_text: Looking at the Billboard Hot 100, “Dreamlover” by Mariah Carey & “That’s The Way Love Goes” by Janet Jackson both spent 8 weeks at number 1 in 1993, but Mariah’s record was on the Hot 100 for a longer period of time (29 weeks compared to 23 weeks for Janet). Mariah’s record also spent 6 more weeks in the Top 40 (26 compared to 20). Both were in the Top 10 for 14 weeks.
